scripts.con:l: npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/cli.ts cfg list
scripts.db:m: npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/cli.ts db migrate --env=dev
scripts.db:mp: npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/cli.ts db migrate --env=prod
scripts.db:seed: npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/cli.ts db schema
scripts.db:su: npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/cli.ts db seed up
scripts.g:saas: npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/cli.ts g saas awing
scripts.g:s: npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/cli.ts g service auth-service
scripts.g:l: npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/cli.ts g lib env4
